insert into hr_attendance_record
user_id, check_time, check_type, result, latitude, longitude, address, distance, device_info,
#{userId}, #{checkTime}, #{checkType}, #{result}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{distance}, #{deviceInfo},
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN result = '1' THEN 1 END) as normalDays, COUNT(CASE WHEN result = '2' THEN 1 END) as lateCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN result = '3' THEN 1 END) as earlyLeaveCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN result = '5' THEN 1 END) as missingCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN result = '4' THEN 1 END) as fieldWorkCount, 0 as leaveDays FROM hr_attendance_record WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{month}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hr_attendance_record r LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.dept_id = #{deptId} AND DATE_FORMAT(r.check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{month} AND r.result = '1' AND r.check_type = '1'

SELECT u.user_id, u.nick_name, d.dept_name, -- 实际出勤天数 (有打卡记录的天数) COALESCE(stats.attendance_days, 0) as attendance_days, -- 迟到次数 COALESCE(stats.late_count, 0) as late_count, -- 早退次数 COALESCE(stats.early_leave_count, 0) as early_leave_count, -- 缺卡次数 (排班了但完全没有打卡记录) ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hr_schedule s WHERE s.user_id = u.user_id AND DATE_FORMAT(s.work_date, '%Y-%m') = #{month} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM hr_attendance_record ar WHERE ar.user_id = s.user_id AND DATE(ar.check_time) = s.work_date ) ) as missing_card_count FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(check_time)) as attendance_days, SUM(CASE WHEN result = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as late_count, SUM(CASE WHEN result = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as early_leave_count FROM hr_attendance_record WHERE DATE_FORMAT(check_time, '%Y-%m') = #{month} GROUP BY user_id ) stats ON u.user_id = stats.user_id WHERE u.del_flag = '0'
AND u.dept_id = #{deptId}
